headline: Show HN: GitHub Based Accommodation
description:
Hi all, A few years ago, I wanted to have other interesting people stay over in our spare room.

To invite Hackers/doers/makers/conference speakers, there is no "interesting" filter on Airbnb.

So I created a hack, https://www.gitsurf.com/, based entirely on Github, which has a very high barrier to entry.

https://www.gitsurf.com/pages/man has more information on the mechanics.

Would people here use it? Should it be entirely open sourced?
